configs.name: AIMP
configs.additionalSettings: {"intermediateLink":[],"customLinkFilterRegex":"do=download.file&id=13","filterByLinkText":false,"skipSort":false,"reverseSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":false,"versionExtractWholePage":true,"requestHeader":[],"defaultPseudoVersioningMethod":"APKLinkHash","trackOnly":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"\\d*.\\d*\\.\\d*  ","matchGroupToUse":"","useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"apkFilterRegEx":"","invertAPKFilter":false,"autoApkFilterByArch":true,"shizukuPretendToBeGooglePlay":false,"allowInsecure":false,"exemptFromBackgroundUpdates":false,"skipUpdateNotifications":false,"about":"An old-school, ad-free, playlist-based audio player for Android","refreshBeforeDownload":true}

description.en: An old-school, ad-free, playlist-based audio player for Android.
